mapper.insert: insert into phicomm_account.sys_user_thirdparty (user_id, nickname, avatar, provider_, open_id, create_time ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update phicomm_account.sys_user_thirdparty set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nickname = #{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provider_ = #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id_, user_id, nickname, avatar, provider_, open_id, create_time, from phicomm_account.sys_user_thirdparty
mapper.delete: delete from phicomm_account.sys_user_thirdparty where open_id = #{0} and provider_ = #{1}
